front.title: IGP Extension for 5G Edge Computing Service

abstract.t: Routers in 5G Local Data Network (LDN) can use additional site-costs, preference, and other application related metrics in addition to the network routing distance to compute constraint-based SPF within the 5G LDN to enhance performance for selected services. This draft describes using application server related metrics to influence the SPF and Flexible Algorithms to indicate the constraints.
